data.title: Tell Me Lies

âTell Me Lies is a page-turner. I devoured it in 48 hours.â âJessica Knoll, New York Times bestselling author of Luckiest Girl Alive

âIf you were pulled in by Joe's passion in You, you'll fall for Stephen and his unique charm in Tell Me Lies.â âPopSugar

"Fans of Colleen Hoover will devour Lovering's debut that is full of toxic love, secrets, and intense romance." âLibrary Journal

"Weaving between perspectives, Carola Loveringâs addictiveâand toxicâlove story explores the pains of letting goâ¦ for good." âUs Weekly

âA sizzling summer read, Tell Me Lies is an absorbing novel with plenty of twists and surprises.â âBustle
